code:
graph TD
    subgraph "Tree Detection"
        PLR[CloudNative_K8sCluster] --> SCAN[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
        SCAN --> LOGS[CloudNative_Serverless]
        LOGS --> CLUSTER[CloudNative_Serverless]
        CLUSTER --> BASE[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
        BASE --> CHECK{CloudNative_Serverless}
        CHECK -->|No| ADD[CloudNative_Serverless]
        CHECK -->|Yes| SKIP[CloudNative_Serverless]
        ADD --> TREES[CloudNative_DockerImage]
    end
    
    subgraph "Tree Cutting Process"
        REQ[CloudNative_ServiceMesh] --> LLM[CloudNative_HelmChart]
        LLM --> COORD[CloudNative_K8sCluster]
        COORD --> MOVE[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
        MOVE --> START[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
        
        START --> HEIGHT[CloudNative_Serverless]
        HEIGHT --> FINDLOGS[CloudNative_Serverless]
        FINDLOGS --> HASLOG{CloudNative_Serverless}
        
        HASLOG -->|Yes| CUT[CloudNative_DockerImage]
        HASLOG -->|No| NEXTH[CloudNative_Serverless]
        
        CUT --> EFFECTS[CloudNative_DockerImage]
        EFFECTS --> WOOD[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
        WOOD --> MORE{CloudNative_DockerImage}
        
        MORE -->|Yes| HEIGHT
        MORE -->|No| NEXTH
        
        NEXTH --> MAXH{CloudNative_DockerImage}
        MAXH -->|No| HEIGHT
        MAXH -->|Yes| DONE[CloudNative_DockerImage]
        
        DONE --> MARK[CloudNative_DockerImage]
        MARK --> COMPLETE[CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
    end
    
    subgraph "Cut Tree Registry"
        MARK --> REGISTRY[CloudNative_Serverless]
        REGISTRY --> KEY[CloudNative_Serverless]
        KEY --> PERSIST[CloudNative_HelmChart]
        PERSIST --> PREVENT[CloudNative_K8sCluster]
    end
    
    style SCAN fill:#e8f5e8
    style CUT fill:#ffebee
    style EFFECTS fill:#fff3e0
    style REGISTRY fill:#f3e5f5
repo_description: Intelligent Agentic NPCs for Minecraft with LLM Integration
